title: Rable and Foner agreement on claim

content.question: Based on their arguments in the excerpts, both Rable and Foner would most likely agree with which of the following claims?

choices.label: The North achieved its aims for Reconstruction.
Federal policy during Reconstruction was inconsistent.
Republicans dominated the South after Reconstruction.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
